analyzed: yasodharā apamukha dasa bhikkhunī sahassa apadāna

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ yasodharāpamukhāni dasabhikkhunīsahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam yasodhara apamukhāni dasa bhikkhunī sahassāni bhagavato sammukhāḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
yasodharā apamukha dasa bhikkhunī sahassa apadānam navama
